name: liwan
description: Liwan is a lightweight YouTube front-end. It provides ad-free playback, basic privacy filters, and a clean UI for browsing and viewing, ideal for those looking to avoid tracking in video consumption.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Ad-free viewing, Privacy filters, Clean interface. Watch YouTube without tracking

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Fast loading, Minimal resources, Simple design. Efficient video browsing

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: No Google tracking, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Control your video viewing

features.title: Privacy Protection
features.description: No tracking cookies, Anonymous viewing, Data minimization. Browse privately

features.title: Video Playback
features.description: HD streaming, Quality selection, Playback controls. Full viewing features

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Video search, Channel browsing, Trending content. Find what you want

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Follow channels, Track uploads, Personalized feed. Stay updated on favorites
